definitions.title: vb. wage war, serve
definitions.body: (Sab. [[חַבא]] wage war with, also n. army, campaign Hom:Chrest. 125 CIS:iv. 299, 1. 2 DHM:VOJ i.28; Eth. z’ab0a: ( > s’ab0a:) wage war; As. ṣâbu, man, soldier; Nö:ZMG xl (1886), 726 al. cp. (on account of Sab. Eth. [[חַ]]) Ar. d.aba0’a conceal oneself, hence lie in wait; this is phonetically suitable, but better in mng. would be s.aba0’a go or come forth (against one), etc., so Thes Lag:BN 21; Frä:232 cp. s.abiy=un young man);—
wage war, fight, c. [[עַל]] against, Nu 31:7 (P) Is 29:7, Is 29:8, Is 31:4, Zec 14:12, c. sf. Is 29:7 (?); abs. Nu 31:42(P).
serve at sacred tent, Levites, c. acc. [[חָבָא]] Nu 4:23, Nu 8:24 (P); women Ex 38:8, Ex 38:8 (P) 1Sa 2:22.
